## SpeakLocale interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SpeakLocale 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [currency?](./qwik-speak.speaklocale.currency.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> ISO 4217 three-letter code |
|  [extension?](./qwik-speak.speaklocale.extension.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Language with Intl extensions language\[-script\]\[-region\]\[-extensions\] |
|  [lang](./qwik-speak.speaklocale.lang.md) |  | string | language\[-script\]\[-region\] Where: - language: ISO 639 two-letter or three-letter code - script: ISO 15924 four-letter script code - region: ISO 3166 two-letter, uppercase code |
|  [timeZone?](./qwik-speak.speaklocale.timezone.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Time zone name from the IANA time zone database |
|  [units?](./qwik-speak.speaklocale.units.md) |  | { \[key: string\]: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Key value pairs of unit identifiers |
